name: Going Viral - Arcade Shooter
description:
Survive as long as you can against incoming waves of enemies in 'Going Viral' - a stylish, top-down arena shooter where you play as a white blood cell fighting against a spreading infection!

Destroy the onslaught of viruses to earn points, and use these points to unlock new areas and a range of devastating weaponry in this arcade shooter.

Features

- A large, vibrant arena to unlock and explore

- 5 unique weapons at your disposal

- A variety of enemy types

Controls

W, A, S, D - Move

Mouse - Aim

Left Click - Shoot

E - Interact

Development Team

Programming - Thomas McCarthy

Art - Patrick McCarthy
